early februari to 1.2 % and this is the

it will be revised even lower based on

now what was the outcome in 1937 well
the entire system plunged into another

is out there and he is saying that the

economy that's
failing which repeats what happened back

supposed to be a neutral independent

economy run hot meaning allowing

election and yellin announced she wanted

more additional hikes in 2017 completely

third quarter of 2015 growth was

since that time GDP growth has collapsed
fourth-quarter 16 growth came in at one

percent Yellen wanted to let the economy
run hot and now the economy is growing
at a two percent rate and it's
forecasted that it's going to be going

the Chinese hierarchy is perhaps a
